## variogram
```{r}
coordinates(expo_wind) <- ~ latitude + longitude
v_windVmaxGust <- variogram(vmax_gust~1, expo_wind, width=0.01) 
ggplot(v_windVmaxGust)+
  geom_point(aes(x=dist,y=gamma))
```
